Name: HMS Barfleur
Builder: Swan Hunter, Tyne and Wear, United Kingdom
Propulsion: 2 steam turbines, 2 shafts, 2 boilers, 50,000 shp (37 MW)
Range: 4,400 nmi (8,100 km; 5,100 mi) at 12 knots (22 km/h; 14 mph)
Armament:
2 × dual 4.5-inch (114 mm) gun
1 × single 4-inch (102 mm) gun
14 × Bofors 40 mm gun
10 × 21 inch (533 mm) torpedo tubes
1 × Squid mortar
Part of:
British Pacific Fleet 1944-45
19th Destroyer Flotilla
3rd Destroyer Flotilla
